headline: How Investors May Respond To Iron Mountain (IRM) Board Appointment and Strong Analyst Earnings Projections
summary: Iron Mountain recently appointed Christie Kelly to its Board of Directors, effective October 21, 2025, bringing extensive finance and strategy expertise from senior leadership roles at Realty Income Corporation, Jones Lang LaSalle, Duke Realty, Lehman Brothers, and General Electric. This leadership addition arrives as Wall Street analysts project very large year-over-year earnings growth for Iron Mountain, highlighting optimism about the company’s performance across core business...

headline: Iron Mountain (IRM): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Dip and Long-Term Gains
summary: Iron Mountain (IRM) has caught the attention of investors this week, with its share price seeing some movement following its latest market performance. For those tracking storage and real estate stocks, the company's recent returns provide some context for how the sector is faring now. See our latest analysis for Iron Mountain. Iron Mountain’s share price recently dipped, ending the week down 3.3%. This move comes after a solid 7.7% share price return over the past three months. While...
